AudioDucker 0.0.6

Onboarding & Settings Refinements

  • Polished Experience: Renamed "Get Started" to "Start Ducking" and updated license UI copy for better clarity.
  • Improved Settings: Fixed a bug where the Settings window wouldn't reset to the General tab and ensured the license status refreshes correctly.
  • License Enforcement: Added logic to redirect to onboarding if a valid license is missing while in settings mode.
  • Developer Tools: Extracted permission messaging logic into a testable component and verified with new unit tests.
  • Robustness: Fixed a regression in audio pause logic to ensure music reliably stops even when detection state is uncertain.
  • Internal Fixes: Resolved a resource path issue that was blocking UI test builds and updated dock icon visibility logic.

AudioDucker 0.0.5

UI & UX Refinements

  • Menu Bar Overhaul: All menu items converted to custom SwiftUI views for consistent 22px padding and improved appearance.
  • Simplified Status: Status text flattened to "Active" (Green) and "Disabled" (Gray) for better clarity.
  • Improved Sliders: Sliders now snap to 5% visual increments, providing more precise and intuitive control.
  • Intuitive Sensitivity: Inverted the sensitivity slider so higher values correctly represent higher sensitivity (easier triggering).
  • Navigation Cleanup: Consolidated Settings and Update sections and removed non-functional shortcuts.

Features & Bug Fixes

  • Context-Aware Disable: The "Disable" menu item now accurately reflects whether AudioDucker is disabled for the currently active application.
  • Concurrency Fixes: Resolved MainActor-related threading issues in global hotkey actions.
  • Layout Consistency: Web preview updated to mirror MacOS menu bar layout and behavior changes.

AudioDucker 0.0.4

License Key Management

  • Secure License Storage: License keys are now stored securely in Keychain instead of UserDefaults
  • License Activation Flow: Implemented async license activation/deactivation with network service abstraction
  • Rate Limiting: Added rate limiting for license activation attempts (3 attempts per minute)
  • App Lifecycle Integration: App now properly sets up/tears down based on license state via notifications
  • Enhanced License UI:
- Added loading spinner during activation - Improved error handling with specific error messages - Removed skip button to enforce license requirement
  • License Service Architecture:
- Added LicenseServiceProtocol with NetworkLicenseService implementation - Added KeychainHelper for secure key storage - Added RateLimitService for activation attempt limiting

Technical Changes

  • Refactored AppDelegate to handle license-activated/deactivated notifications
  • Updated LicenseViewController with async activation and better UX
  • Added notification constants for license and microphone permission events
  • Updated tests to work with async license operations
  • Improved SetupCompleteViewController text wrapping
